A

AnnotatedFieldMapper<FieldType,AnnotationType extends Annotation> - Interface in io.neba.api.resourcemodels
OSGi services implementing this interface may customize the mapping of arbitrary fields during the resource to model mapping of any resource model.
AnnotatedFieldMapper.OngoingMapping<FieldType,AnnotationType> - Interface in io.neba.api.resourcemodels
Represents the contextual data of a field mapping during a resource to model mapping.

B

BeanRenderer - Interface in io.neba.api.rendering
Renders any object to a string using an internal template mechanism, such as velocity.
The view used to render the object is derived from the object's type and the provided view hint.
BeanRendererFactory - Interface in io.neba.api.rendering
Obtains BeanRenderer instances with a specific name configured in the sling console.

S

SelfTest - Annotation Type in io.neba.api.annotations
Methods annotated with SelfTest are considered selftests of a service component and are automatically detected.
Selftest methods must adhere to the following conventions:
They must be applied to a public void method without arguments The annotated bean must have application scope (i.e.
